title: Installation issue: expat
body:
Note: This is related to #15733, as my failure to build libbsd led me to try using the system-provided package to meet expat's dependencies.

# Spack version
```console
$ spack --version
0.14.1-422-61c1322
```

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ module --force purge
$ module load xl
$ git clone https://github.com/spack/spack.git
$ source ./spack/share/spack/setup-env.sh 
$ cd spack
$ spack compiler list
$ spack install expat%xl@16.1

==> Error: Failed to install expat due to ChildError: ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:
    '/var/tmp/quellyn/spack-stage/spack-stage-expat-2.2.9-pwmbtxfdotnhptqhnvp5hk5meygoxbf5/spack-src/configure' '--prefix=/g/g12/quellyn/GIT/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-power9le/xl-16.1/expat-2.2.9-pwmbtxfdotnhptqhnvp5hk5meygoxbf5' '--without-docbook' '--with-libbsd'
2 errors found in build log:
     69     checking if /g/g12/quellyn/GIT/spack/lib/spack/env/xl/xlc PIC flag -fPIC -DPIC works...
             yes
     70     checking if /g/g12/quellyn/GIT/spack/lib/spack/env/xl/xlc static flag -static works... 
            yes
     71     checking if /g/g12/quellyn/GIT/spack/lib/spack/env/xl/xlc supports -c -o file.o... yes
     72     checking if /g/g12/quellyn/GIT/spack/lib/spack/env/xl/xlc supports -c -o file.o... (cac
            hed) yes
     73     checking whether the /g/g12/quellyn/GIT/spack/lib/spack/env/xl/xlc linker (/usr/bin/ld 
            -m elf64lppc) supports shared libraries... yes
     74     checking whether -lc should be explicitly linked in... no
  >> 75     checking dynamic linker characteristics... /usr/tce/packages/xl/xl-2020.03.18/xlC/16.1.
            1/bin/.orig/xlc_r: error: 1501-294 No input file specified. Please use -qhelp for more 
            information.
     76     GNU/Linux ld.so
     77     checking how to hardcode library paths into programs... immediate
     78     checking whether stripping libraries is possible... yes
     79     checking if libtool supports shared libraries... yes
     80     checking whether to build shared libraries... yes
     81     checking whether to build static libraries... yes

     ...

     120    checking whether compiler supports visibility... yes
     121    checking for ANSI C header files... (cached) yes
     122    checking whether byte ordering is bigendian... no
     123    checking for an ANSI C-conforming const... yes
     124    checking for size_t... yes
     125    checking for arc4random_buf in -lbsd... no
  >> 126    configure: error: Enforced use of libbsd cannot be satisfied.
```

### Platform and user environment

```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux rzansel61 4.14.0-115.10.1.1chaos.ch6a.ppc64le #1 SMP Thu Aug 8 15:51:58 PDT 2019 ppc64le ppc64le ppc64le GNU/Linux

$ lsb_release -d
Description:	Red Hat Enterprise Linux Server release 7.6 (Maipo)
``` 
[compilers.yaml.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4400304/compilers.yaml.txt)
[packages.yaml.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4400305/packages.yaml.txt)


### Additional information

```console
$ spack spec --install-status expat%xl@16.1

Input spec
--------------------------------
 -   expat%xl@16.1

Concretized
--------------------------------
 -   expat@2.2.9%xl@16.1 fflags="-qzerosize" +libbsd arch=linux-rhel7-power9le
[+]      ^libbsd@0.8.3%xl@16.1 fflags="-qzerosize"  arch=linux-rhel7-power9le
```

$ spack log-parse --show=errors,warnings config.log
